headline.main: Aid for France Urged; De Gaulle Ideals Held Necessary To 'Livable' Europe

lead_paragraph: As a nonpartisan Frenchman who believes in Republican and Democratic ideals, who is not interested in personalities and thinks only of the Allied victory and the liberation of his country, may I express my anguish concerning the present policy of the Allies toward France?
abstract: L Guerdan lr on US policy; de Gaulle-Giraud situation discussed
